20110109020004.000|20110109020006.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, WHO MAKE THESE -- WHO 
20110109020006.000|20110109020007.000|CC1|REPEAT THESE KINDS OF FALSEHOODS
20110109020007.000|20110109020009.000|CC1|ON THE AIR AND IN PUBLIC SQUARES
20110109020009.000|20110109020010.000|CC1|ALL OVER THIS COUNTRY.          
20110109020010.000|20110109020012.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, THE PEOPLE WHO SAY,   
20110109020012.000|20110109020014.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, IT'S NOT ABOUT HEALTH 
20110109020014.000|20110109020016.000|CC1|CARE, IT'S ABOUT THE PRESIDENT  
20110109020016.000|20110109020017.000|CC1|WANTING TO KILL YOUR            
20110109020017.000|20110109020018.000|CC1|GRANDMOTHER.

20110109020018.000|20110109020020.000|CC1|IMMIGRATION REFORM, IT'S ABOUT A
20110109020020.000|20110109020021.000|CC1|SECRET PLOT ON THE PART OF      
20110109020021.000|20110109020024.000|CC1|MEXICO TO RECONQUER THE         
20110109020024.000|20110109020025.000|CC1|SOUTHWESTERN UNITED STATES.     
20110109020025.000|20110109020027.000|CC1|AND ON AND ON AND ON.           
20110109020027.000|20110109020029.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, WHILE THE PEOPLE WHO  
20110109020029.000|20110109020032.000|CC1|MAKE THOSE STATEMENTS, YOU KNOW,
20110109020032.000|20110109020033.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY DO NOT INTEND DIRECTLY
20110109020033.000|20110109020038.000|CC1|FOR PEOPLE TO BE HARMED OR      
20110109020038.000|20110109020039.000|CC1|MURDERED.                       
20110109020039.000|20110109020040.000|CC1|I THINK IT'S ENTIRELY A NATURAL 
20110109020040.000|20110109020043.000|CC1|THAT SOME PEOPLE OUT THERE WHO  
20110109020043.000|20110109020045.000|CC1|ARE DISTURBED, YOU KNOW,        
20110109020045.000|20110109020046.000|CC1|ACTUALLY ACT ON THESE THINGS.   
20110109020046.000|20110109020048.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY THAT IS A TINY SLIVER 
20110109020048.000|20110109020049.000|CC1|OF THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHO HEAR
20110109020049.000|20110109020051.000|CC1|THESE KINDS OF STATEMENTS.      
20110109020051.000|20110109020052.000|CC1|BUT WE'VE REACHED A POINT AS THE
20110109020052.000|20110109020054.000|CC1|SHERIFF SUGGESTED WHERE THE     
20110109020054.000|20110109020057.000|CC1|VITREAL IS SO HOT OUT THERE THAT
20110109020057.000|20110109020058.000|CC1|SOME PEOPLE WHO ARE DISTURBED GO
20110109020058.000|20110109020100.000|CC1|OUT THERE AND COMMIT THESE KINDS
20110109020100.000|20110109020100.000|CC1|OF ACTS.                        
20110109020100.000|20110109020104.000|CC1|I THINK AT LEAST ON AN ANECDOTAL
20110109020104.000|20110109020105.000|CC1|BASIS WE'VE BEEN SEEING MORE AND
20110109020105.000|20110109020107.000|CC1|MORE OF THAT IN THE LAST COUPLE 
20110109020107.000|20110109020107.000|CC1|YEARS.

20110109020220.000|20110109020222.000|CC1|SUPERMARKET IN TUCSON, ARIZONA.

20110109021120.000|20110109021123.000|CC1|EVENT OUT OF A TOTAL OF 19      
20110109021123.000|20110109021123.000|CC1|INJURED.

20110109021126.000|20110109021126.000|CC1|HURT.

20110109021129.000|20110109021130.000|CC1|DISTRICT JUDGE JOHN ROLL OF     
20110109021130.000|20110109021131.000|CC1|ARIZONA.                        
20110109021131.000|20110109021133.000|CC1|ONE OF THE FATALITIES IS A      
20110109021133.000|20110109021133.000|CC1|9-YEAR-OLD GIRL.

20110109021135.000|20110109021136.000|CC1|INCLUDING JUDGE ROLL WHO WAS

20110109021141.000|20110109021144.000|CC1|COUNTY, CLARENCE DUPNIK SAID,   
20110109021144.000|20110109021146.000|CC1|HAD COME BY TO SAY HI TO        
20110109021146.000|20110109021147.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS AT HER   
20110109021147.000|20110109021149.000|CC1|TOWN HALL-TYPE MEETING, CONGRESS
20110109021149.000|20110109021151.000|CC1|ON YOUR CORNER, AS THE          
20110109021151.000|20110109021154.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN CALLED IT.        
20110109021154.000|20110109021155.000|CC1|THE SHERIFF CALLED JUDGE ROLL   
20110109021155.000|20110109021157.000|CC1|ONE OF THE FINEST HUMAN BEINGS  
20110109021157.000|20110109021158.000|CC1|I'VE EVER KNOWN.                
20110109021158.000|20110109021200.000|CC1|HE CALLED CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS

20110109032551.000|20110109032552.000|CC1|>> YEAH, YOU AIN'T GOT NO       
20110109032552.000|20110109032556.000|CC1|EVIDENCE.

20110109032557.000|20110109032558.000|CC1|MINE?

20110109033650.000|20110109033651.000|CC1|INVOLVED IN A HIGH SPEED CHASE  
20110109033651.000|20110109033653.000|CC1|WHILE ON PAROLE STARTED A FIGHT 
20110109033653.000|20110109033654.000|CC1|IN THE CAFETERIA AND WAS HIT IN 
20110109033654.000|20110109033657.000|CC1|THE HEAD BY A WOODEN BLOCK.     
20110109033657.000|20110109033658.000|CC1|WE MET HIM THE FOLLOWING        
20110109033658.000|20110109033701.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110109033701.000|20110109033702.000|CC1|>> TELL ME THE STORY.

20110109033708.000|20110109033710.000|CC1|>> I HAD A PERSONAL PROBLEM AND 
20110109033710.000|20110109033712.000|CC1|I RAN OVER TO HANDLE IT, BUT    
20110109033712.000|20110109033714.000|CC1|DIDN'T MAKE IT ALL THE WAY.

20110109033726.000|20110109033727.000|CC1|TELLING ME I GOT HIT IN THE HEAD

20110109034733.000|20110109034739.000|CC1|MOST FRUIT HAVE SOME, AND I

20110109035723.000|20110109035724.000|CC1|HE HAS AGED SINCE FIRST COMING

20110109035731.000|20110109035732.000|CC1|>> HERE A SCORPION THAT HE'S    
20110109035732.000|20110109035736.000|CC1|MADE.

20110109035750.000|20110109035752.000|CC1|ITEMS THAT HE MAKES THE MOST OF.

20110109035755.000|20110109035755.000|CC1|AND SCORPIONS.                  
20110109035755.000|20110109035756.000|CC1|I WOULD ASSUME THIS IS SOMETHING
20110109035756.000|20110109035759.000|CC1|LIKE A HARP.                    
20110109035759.000|20110109035802.000|CC1|AND HE'S MADE IT OUT OF TOILET

20110109035804.000|20110109035805.000|CC1|IT LOOKS LIKE SOME DENTAL FLOSS,

20110109035811.000|20110109035816.000|CC1|THE COLORING, HE USED KOOL-AID.

20110109035817.000|20110109035818.000|CC1|>> WHY DO YOU HAVE IT?          
20110109035818.000|20110109035819.000|CC1|>> HE'S NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE IT. 
20110109035819.000|20110109035820.000|CC1|OCCASIONALLY, WE GO THROUGH AND 
20110109035820.000|20110109035821.000|CC1|DO CELL SEARCHES AND CONFISCATE

20110109035833.000|20110109035835.000|CC1|AND DISPOSE OF IT

20110109035840.000|20110109035842.000|CC1|PRETTY PASSIVE.

20110109035842.000|20110109035849.000|CC1|MORE.

20110109035849.000|20110109035850.000|CC1|HANGING ON THE WALL OF THE      
20110109035850.000|20110109035851.000|CC1|PRISON'S INVESTIGATIVE SERVICES 
20110109035851.000|20110109035857.000|CC1|OFFICE.                         
20110109035857.000|20110109035859.000|CC1|>> THIS IS WHEN CHARLES MANSON  
20110109035859.000|20110109035901.000|CC1|WAS ON THE PROTECTIVE YARD AND  
20110109035901.000|20110109035903.000|CC1|THE INMATES THAT WERE ON THE    
20110109035903.000|20110109035905.000|CC1|MAXIMUM SECURITY YARD WERE ABLE 
20110109035905.000|20110109035907.000|CC1|TO DEFEAT THE SECURITY LOCK AND 
20110109035907.000|20110109035910.000|CC1|GOT THROUGH THERE.              
20110109035910.000|20110109035911.000|CC1|MANSON WAS OUT IN THE YARD
